channel.title: CVE Feed for NEOJAPAN Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NEOJAPAN Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0682|2024-08-05T03:35:48.932Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R4.0 and earlier) does not properly manage sessions, which allows remote attackers to read/send mail or change the configuration via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0683|2024-08-05T03:35:49.007Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Buffer overflow in Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R4.0 and earlier) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition via Cookie data.

item.title: CVE-2018-0685|2024-08-05T03:35:49.041Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier allows remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via HTTP requests for mail search.

item.title: CVE-2018-0681|2024-08-05T03:35:48.626Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R4.0 and earlier) uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow remote attackers to login to the Management page and change the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-0687|2024-08-05T03:35:49.358Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R4.0 and earlier) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0680|2024-08-05T03:35:48.898Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R4.0 and earlier) uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow remote attackers to read/send mail or change the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-0684|2024-08-05T03:35:48.732Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r3.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r3.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Buffer overflow in Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R3.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R3.0 and earlier) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition via multipart/form-data format data.

item.title: CVE-2018-0686|2024-08-05T03:35:49.075Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20by%20neojapan%20inc.%20%28denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%2C%20denbun%20imap%20version%20v3.3i%20r4.0%20and%20earlier%29
item.description: Denbun by NEOJAPAN Inc. (Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier, Denbun IMAP version V3.3I R4.0 and earlier) allows remote authenticated attackers to upload and execute any executable files via unspecified vectors.
